title: Google Assistant options are not working
content:
I had Google Assistant on Redmi Note 8T and it worked well. I was seeing the "Hi, how can I help" message every time I said "Ok, Google"
Now I bought Pixel 4 and Assistant is just using the Google search for every command or question I ask. It is not telling the jokes, not playing games etc. All is going to Google search.
Please advise what can I do with that.
